description: How to create Youtube channel from scratch? Youtube is incredible marketing tool, you can build a list, or you can get paid entertaining people, but you got to start from somewhere, I will show you step by step how to setup Youtube channel, monetize it, do SEO, spy successful Youtuber's keywords, run Youtube ads boost it when you just begin. It's a easy, simple course for beginners.
title: How to Start a YouTube Channel - Step by Step Guide
